pinyin: dan1 chun2 pao4 zhen3 bing4 du2

sentences.english: Thymidine kinase gene is found in herpes simplex virus.
sentences.chinese: 胸苷激酶基因被發現在單純皰疹病毒。

sentences.english: But the clinical lesions share the same features with herpetic vesicles.
sentences.chinese: 但是皰疹病毒形成的水泡也會有相同的臨牀表現。

sentences.english: Sometimes, people do not exhibit symptoms but are herpes carriers all the same.
sentences.chinese: 那些沒有表現出明顯症狀的皰疹病毒攜帶者比比皆是。

sentences.english: How Is The Cold Sore Virus Spread?
sentences.chinese: 皰疹病毒是如何傳播的？

sentences.english: Tumors induced by some retroviruses and herpesvirus are very common in chickens.
sentences.chinese: 反轉錄病毒及皰疹病毒可在雞引起腫瘤。

sentences.english: Cold sores caused by herpes virus type1 are very contagious.
sentences.chinese: 一型皰疹病毒造成的脣皰疹是非常易傳染性的。

sentences.english: HSV is adept at penetrating the dermis and reaching the nerve pathways.
sentences.chinese: 單純皰疹病毒很熟練地穿透皮膚並進入神經鏈路。

sentences.english: Such "punched out" ulcers are suggestive of herpes simplex infection.
sentences.chinese: 此種“穿孔”性潰瘍提示有單純皰疹病毒的感染。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate whether there is latency of herpes simplex virus 1 (HSV-1) in the ciliary body of normal human eyes.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究正常人睫狀體是否有單純皰疹病毒Ⅰ型潛伏。

sentences.english: Equine rhinopneumonitis is mammals infection cause by Equine rhinopneumonitis Virus.
sentences.chinese: 馬鼻肺炎是由馬皰疹病毒引起的馬屬動物傳染病。

sentences.english: Cold sores caused by herpes virus type1 are very contagious.
sentences.chinese: 單純皰疹病毒腦炎有特有的神經解剖學特徵。

sentences.english: Men can shed infectious herpes virus through normal-appearing genital skin.
sentences.chinese: 男性可通過外觀正常的生殖道皮膚傳播皰疹病毒。
皰疹病毒通過體液傳播。

sentences.english: Almost all humans become infected with herpesviruses during childhood.
sentences.chinese: 幾乎每個人在兒童時期都受到過皰疹病毒的感染。
